entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kluane Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burwash Airport 8:28 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
